Text.Page:
(Corann, looking really troubled.)

Uhm... About Ohdi.... I guess Ohdi grew really fond of Undead bones while he was staying there. He wouldn't look at the food I gave him.

So...I was wondering if you could get me as many {@LinkCreature:3#16#Fallen Defenders} bones as you can. I'm afraid Ohdi will leave home again if I don't get those bones. And if he ever disappears again, I don't think I'll be able to take it.... Please help me.

In life they served us well. I hope they find new peace in death.

Thanks.
I'm not asking you to make a special trip. You're certain to battle undead more than enough in your time in Oblivion Woods.
